meals.name: Taco Night
meals.description: Ground turkey tacos with whole wheat tortillas

ingredients.name: Black beans with cumin and lime

meals.instructions:
1. Season 1 lb ground turkey with taco seasoning and cook in large skillet
2. Warm black beans in microwave, add cumin and lime juice
3. Set up taco bar with tortillas, lettuce, tomatoes, and cheese
4. Let everyone build their own tacos

meals.name: One Pan Chicken & Vegetables
meals.instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 425°F
2. Season chicken thighs with salt, pepper, garlic powder
3. Add chopped vegetables to sheet pan with chicken
4. Drizzle with olive oil and roast 20-25 minutes
5. Microwave sweet potatoes while cooking (poke holes, 4-5 minutes)

meals.name: Quick Pasta Night
meals.description: Whole grain pasta with turkey meatballs
meals.instructions:
1. Cook pasta according to package directions
2. Heat frozen meatballs in microwave or skillet
3. Make quick sauce: heat diced tomatoes with Italian seasoning and garlic powder
4. Add frozen spinach to sauce for last 2 minutes
5. Serve with big side salad using cucumbers and tomatoes

meals.name: Sheet Pan Salmon
meals.instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 400°F
2. Place salmon and vegetables on sheet pan
3. Season with lemon, herbs, olive oil, salt, pepper
4. Bake 12-15 minutes until salmon flakes easily
5. Heat brown rice packets in microwave

meals.name: Breakfast for Dinner
meals.instructions:
1. Cook turkey sausage according to package directions
2. Scramble eggs with diced bell peppers and spinach
3. Add cheese in last minute of cooking
4. Serve with toast or make breakfast tacos with tortillas

meals.name: Adventure Day - Flexible
meals.instructions:
1. Pick up rotisserie chicken from grocery store
2. Serve with pre-made salad and rolls
3. Alternative: Simple sandwich night with deli turkey and fresh vegetables

meals.name: Adventure Day - Flexible
meals.instructions:
1. Make grilled cheese with whole grain bread
2. Heat tomato soup and add any leftover vegetables
3. Serve with fresh fruit from your snack stash
